| History                 = The Brigade of Realms were a group of elite warriors from the nine realms created to protect all the realms against any threat. [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Thor]] and [[Sif (Earth-616)|Sif]] trained them.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 2}}

They were later recruited from [[Volstagg (Earth-616)|Volstagg]] to fight against the citizens of [[Broxton]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 5}} Also Volstagg called them to assist him against [[Galan (Earth-616)|Galactus]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 6}}
